name: Muck Marauders
description:
Game is sadly unfinished, but  it is the first step for me and my wife to get better acquainted at game jams. Please be gentle :).

Art by: https://www.instagram.com/sunnysummerskye/

You will need to run this against love2d: https://love2d.org/

Source: https://github.com/psyomn/notes/tree/master/languages/love2d/muckworld
